properties.description: Copy new or updated rows only from database using external control table

activities.name: LookupLastWaterMark
activities.description: Retrieve the last high-watermark value stored in external control table

activities.name: LookupCurrentWaterMark
activities.description: Retrieve  the current maximum value in watermark column of source data store

activities.name: DeltaCopyfromDB
activities.description: Copy activity to use query to filter the delta data by > last high-watermark and <= current high-watermark from source database, and then only copy the changes to the destination store.

query.value:
select  ID
      ,TakenStatus
      ,TakenDate
      ,AverageCost
      ,StandardCost
      ,LastCost
      ,Color
      ,POCode
      ,Reference
      ,PODateStamp
      ,POLineTimeStamp
      ,SpecialOrderDate
      ,TripNo
      ,LandedCost
      ,AutoBackorder
      ,ManufacturersWarranty
      ,ReplacementCost
      ,UserVerified
      ,DateVerified
      ,TimeVerified
      ,OriginalCost
      ,ReserveExclusive
      ,CommissionCode
      ,EDIFormat
      ,BranchCode
      ,sysCreated
      ,sysModified
      ,DateCreated
      ,DateModified
      ,DateStamp
      ,InPackage
      ,InvoiceCode
      ,LineTimeStamp
      ,LocationCode
      ,ModelCode
      ,ModelDesc
      ,NewUsed
      ,QtyOrdered
      ,QtyReserved
      ,QtyShipped
      ,SellingPrice
      ,Spiff
      ,Status
      ,Tax1
      ,Tax1CostList
      ,Tax1Included
      ,Tax1Percentage
      ,Tax2
      ,Tax3
      ,Total
      ,UserCreated
      ,UserModified
from 
@{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_Table_Name} where @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn} > '@{activity('LookupLastWaterMark').output.firstRow.InvoiceModelwatermark_value}' and @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn} <= '@{activity('LookupCurrentWaterMark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'

UNION
select  ID
      ,TakenStatus
      ,TakenDate
      ,AverageCost
      ,StandardCost
      ,LastCost
      ,Color
      ,POCode
      ,Reference
      ,PODateStamp
      ,POLineTimeStamp
      ,SpecialOrderDate
      ,TripNo
      ,LandedCost
      ,AutoBackorder
      ,ManufacturersWarranty
      ,ReplacementCost
      ,UserVerified
      ,DateVerified
      ,TimeVerified
      ,OriginalCost
      ,ReserveExclusive
      ,CommissionCode
      ,EDIFormat
      ,BranchCode
      ,sysCreated
      ,sysModified
      ,DateCreated
      ,DateModified
      ,DateStamp
      ,InPackage
      ,InvoiceCode
      ,LineTimeStamp
      ,LocationCode
      ,ModelCode
      ,ModelDesc
      ,NewUsed
      ,QtyOrdered
      ,QtyReserved
      ,QtyShipped
      ,SellingPrice
      ,Spiff
      ,Status
      ,Tax1
      ,Tax1CostList
      ,Tax1Included
      ,Tax1Percentage
      ,Tax2
      ,Tax3
      ,Total
      ,UserCreated
      ,UserModified
from 
	 @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_Table_Name} 
	 where @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn_modified} > '@{activity('LookupLastWaterMark').output.firstRow.InvoiceModelwatermark_value}' 
	 and @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn_modified} <= '@{activity('LookupCurrentWaterMark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'

activities.name: UpdateWaterMark
activities.description: Stored procedure activity to store the new high-watermark value into external control table for delta data loading.
